column.text: 岗位所在的组织(冗余字段)

statements.statement:
select * from t_position_category_org where 1=1 <#if query??> <#-- -------------------关键字查询开始 --------------- --> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and (
org_name like '%${key}%' or
org_node_path like '%${key}%'
) </#if> <#-- -------------------关键字查询结束 --------------- -->
<#-- -------------------综合查询开始 --------------- -->
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.positCategoryId??> and duties_category_id = ${query.positCategoryId} </#if>
<#if query.positionId??> and duties_id = ${query.positionId} </#if>
<#if query.orgId??> and org_id = ${query.orgId} </#if>
<#if query.orgName??> and org_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.orgName)}' </#if>
<#if query.orgNodePath??> and org_node_path = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.orgNodePath)}' </#if>
<#-- -------------------综合查询结束 --------------- --> </#if>
